place_description: Bitty & Beau's Coffee is more than just a place to grab a cup of coffee - it's an experience. While the shop is run by people with intellectual and developmental disabilities and the the customers love the products, they really come in for the unique customer service experience.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing coffee shop and service. I stopped in while in the area and got a cold brew. The atmosphere was extremely welcoming and the vibe was really comforting here. The cold brew was great and not too acidity as well. Highly recommend this place!

Great service and cold brew! Zach was super friendly and invited our dog inside bc it was so hot out and offered her a pup cup. All of the employees were personable and efficient. The store was spotless and a great place to meet up!
I haven't had their food yet, however everything else is perfecto! Love to supporting this mission! On behalf of Chris's crusty lips and 2 stars.. Much love gang!

Since moving to NC, Bitty & Beau's has been on my list of places to see. And my birthday seemed like the perfect day to stop in for a coffee. Not only was the coffee and bagel delicious, but the staff were amazing! I will be back for sure!

Thank you for all that you are doing for these great humans with disability!!

Bitty & Beau's Coffee is a great experience for all. Their mission is truly awe-inspiring, and it's amazing to get such great service and food/drinks at the same time! A great location as well, with plenty of seating inside and out!
Wholesome place with good coffee. Great location to grab and go as the area is very walkable, but finding parking can be a challenge.
Great cafe
Had a great cup of coffee here.  Service was friendly too!  Had a great chat about airplanes while ordering.  Extra bonus!

Has potential due to the nice atmosphere and location but needs real baristas and actual espresso machines.  Not the same machines that you basically see in airline lounges that are self serve.

Was in town on a work trip and stopped by with a group.  I asked for a cortado or espresso macchiato. The cashier looked confused and after a moment told me they only have "push button machines" and can't make one.

Fine.....I'll do it myself I thought.  I ordered a small cappuccino, planned to just pour the excess milk out and when I opened the lid to the drink, it was so full of milk that it made a mess all over the cup due to being filled all the way to the top.

Even after pouring out half of the cup the drink was still not good at all.  Just tasted like hot milk with with a hint of coffee.

So overall,  if you aren't into pre-made drinks from a push button machine consider another establishment.  I can't say I would return.
Love, love, love this place! The atmosphere is guaranteed to put a smile on your face and brighten your day. The coffee is amazing and served by the sweetest staff. Ashley the owner was incredible!

Stopped by during a visit to Charlotte and was so pleasantly surprised! My niece got a strawberry banana smoothie and I got an iced matcha latte. Great customer service, friendly atmosphere and delicious offerings!
great coffee shop and great mission! keep up the good work!
LOVE IT HERE!!!
Nice place to sit down and have some coffee.  Nice hoodies and travel mugs for sale.

It is so hard to walk into this place and not instantly be in a better mood than before you entered! I love to see everyone just thriving!  Everyone was so pleasant and welcoming. We ordered a mocha latte and a smoothie and both were amazing! I can't wait to visit again!
Great service! Very clean! Been here numerous times
Top notch customer service.  Super delicious lavender latte!  Zack makes it Happen!

We LOVE the vibe, the staff are absolutely wonderful, the place was packed this afternoon after we arrived.  The owners are awesome and welcomed our group! Sat and had coffee, amazing frappes and sweets, others around us sat and enjoyed the coffee and Wi-Fi, we bought amazing (great quality) shirts, a mug and thermos. Can't wait to go back! Plan ahead for parking (there isn't a lot) but there is a parking deck around the corner. Cute shops, great restaurants around BnB, so it's definitely worth the walk! Oh, they sell Bitty and Beaus K-Cups too.
This coffee shop curates a great, welcoming environment. The service is fantastic, the coffee is great quality, and the space is great for co-working or meeting someone for a meeting.
Super cute little spot around a ton of other eateries. I love the inclusive undertones.

This place is a place I have dreamed of! Where everyone is accepted and my son fits right in!!! I'm so grateful for a place where I can show my son that he matters and is an EQUAL! The drinks were amazing and the staff was super friendly!!!!
Gotta go.  Great coffee and great atmosphere.

A lot of people give this place 5 stars because of their social mission. That's nice and all but I just think they have consistently good drip coffee. I don't order lattes or chais so I have no idea if they have any espresso prowess. But the drip coffee is the best in south end even if slightly more expensive. Puts NJC and Rhino to shame in the drip coffee game.
Ordered a cortado. Was asked if the milk should be steamed, which should have ripped me off.  Got something that resembled a latte.

I love the mission and story behind this place!
The customer experience is also great!

I love that they give you a playing card tied to your order (e.g. king of hearts) which you use to pick up your order.

The atmosphere is great and there's a lot of available seating.

It's very fun seeing the Instagram or Facebook counter flip soon after you hit "like" or "follow" on your phone!

I got my usual latte and it was just okay, so that was my only issue.

I will certainly be back to support their cause of awareness and inclusion of people with Down syndrome!
Give this place a try and support them too!

First time at Bitty and Beau's with my fiancee for NYE, and I love the detail to the order. Frannie took our order expertly, and asked about specifics that I forgot to ask as a long time coffee lover. We will definitely be back!
Always friendly and fast service. Love the different roasts available all day
Good coffee and the service was great!
This is such an amazing concept! Absolutely love this.

A very nice, clean, quiet place. You can sit there and work, they have electric outlets to charge your phone or laptop. Friendly staff. They didn't have whole milk, which is weird for a coffee shop. I got a regular 16 oz medium roast coffee without milk and it was sour, it wasn't for me. I'm sure some people will love it though.

It's a really great spot to do work, have a meeting, or just get a cup of coffee and a bagel. And it's so nice to know that your patronage also supports individuals intellectual and development disabilities.
Connor is the best!
Friendly staff
Outstanding coffee and service! It was nice meeting Zach and Frannie!
It's my favorite place to get coffee in the neighborhood.   The staff is amazing and super friendly! Coffee is delicious!
Great coffee shop with a bustling friendly vibe. Great place to bring kids or come with friends to grab a coffee or bagel. they also have a fair number of tables.
Love their mission and I love their coffee. It's always a great experience! You have to check this place out!
What an incredibly delightful experience! I love everything about this business, and it's mission. And the coffee was great too!
Bitty & Beau's is awesome and so inclusive! Jake took care of us at the register and was so polite and accommodating! The environment was great. My partner and I will definitely be returning!
Great coffee and service
Friendly staff and excellent coffee! I got an iced latte with flavored cold foam, soo good!

I love coming to Bitty and Beau's, they have the best coffee and atmosphere. Everyone is so cheerful and kind! I always feel welcome here and try to come several days a week. Zach knows my coffee order by heart! Edward and Jillian are always so friendly and sweet! Connor always jumps up to grab me a water when I've walked from Uptown and I need to cool down! I just met JP and Alex today and they both are so wonderful, too! Frannie is great at the register and Matthew's voice is very impressive when he announces your coffee is ready!
I love this place!
Best staff and coffee I've had! The staff and atmosphere are so amazing!
Probably the sweetest coffee shop we've ever visited! Everything we ordered was great. Smoothies frappuccino and the cake pops!
Delicious, great service, fun place!
Great place to unwind. Thank you for the great service
Great heart for disabled employees
Owners have greatest reason they hire their staff

I came in to do some work, plenty of spaces, wifi and power outlets to setup shop and sip on some good chai tea.  The staff are very friendly, chill music, AC and cozy atmosphere.  I didn't try the food, but their bagels, and sweets looked delicious.
Was having a rough morning, and got this kind message on my cup from Jillian.  Thanks Jillian, you made my day a little brighter.
I got an iced chai with vanilla and it was very good! The place was spacious and people were nice.
Great drinks and great service! Highly recommended.
We visited Bitty & Beau's twice while visiting Charlotte. The coffee was excellent, and so was the staff!  We had the best coffee shop experience!
Could site there for hours!

I found this coffee shop by chance.  I was greeted when I walked in, and the service was helpful and friendly.

My drink was delicious and the decor was iconic.

I only learned after the fact the business employ's individuals with special needs

I came by chance but would come again by choice.
Excellent customer service.  Best lemon cranberry muffin.  You don't need to ask for the muffin to he warmed, its automatic.  Delicious too.
Excellent service and high quality products! the most amazing thing is the inclusiveness and accessibility of the place! highly recommend.
Good coffee, great mission!
Es una importante cadena de cafeterias atendida x chicos con capacidades diferentes
Great coffee. Had the Java Chip and the staff was amazing! Well run businesses like this are the only reason I stay in this overcrowded town!

Such a bright little spot in the city for great coffee and even better conversation.  They don't skimp on flavor in their drinks, and the cheeky little playing cards they give you as a ticket are a fun touch!
Love this place and their purpose. Great coffee shop no matter what their purpose
Excellent service!  Thank you
Always met here with great coffee and friendly faces! Love love love B&B!
It's expensive. Almost $7 for a 16oz chai latte...it was really good though. Spicy and not too sweet.

Love this coffee shop!! Great friendly atmosphere, fast service, and a very conducive place to work on school work, work from home, etc. Has nice seating both inside and outside and free Wi-Fi for guests.

This is no ordinary coffee shop, I mean they obviously have incredible coffee, but the real gem here is the people who work here and the message behind their business! Our son has soecial needs, so places like this are incredibly important to us.
Iced chai latte was tasty, but not the most flavorful. Atmosphere inside was warm, welcoming, and friendly!

Asked for a tea latte with oat milk, since my girlfriend has a severe allergy to almond milk. After one sip her throat starts swelling. They refused a refund and claimed there was no way possible they gave me anything but oat milk, no way there was cross contamination. It's not about the $4-5, it's about health safety. "More than a cup of coffee" - yeah, an allergic reaction and a sprint to a pharmacy.

Also the tea was mid
This is one of the greatest business ideas ever.  I wish more companies would do this. An unbelievable idea. And the coffee and baked goods are really good!
Delicious coffee; will for sure be back! Loved this place! So glad to be able to support a good cause!
Outstanding chai tea latte
Super sweet staff & great coffee. I went in with a friend & her nanny kid, the staff was so eager to say hi to him and keep him entertained while we waited. It's a little pricey but not terrible

Really good coffee!
The employees are all with mental health issues and some are on the spectrum, but it doesn't show.
They are polite and professional and the service is great.
The place is clean and organized and the decor is fun and inviting.
A nice spot to grab a cup of joe, relax and enjoy some awesome dog watching, oh and the people watching is fun too.
Very happy with my experience and the staff here is wonderful

Yeah the story is nice and touchy, but if you appreciate a good cup of coffee this is not the place for you.
I've tried coffee here 5 times before making any conclusions and there was no single time when it was good.  And also it's not cheap at all.
Wonderful mission and great coffee. Highly recommended!
One of the cuties coffee shop in Charlotte! Customer service, food, coffee 10/10!
Pretty nice place. Very Minor mess up in my order but it was not a big deal.
Best Americano I have had as of 12/4/22
Great atmosphere! Got a bag of beans/grounds to go (which smelled phenomenal). If the coffee there is anything like I think it is, absolutely worth a cup!!
Loved the coffee and service was fantastic!

A rather lovely venue, with friendly staff, good coffee and a laid back and inviting atmosphere. There's WiFi, plenty of power points and it was spotlessly clean. The chain is also built on a premise of helping those with disabilities, a wonderful endeavour. I hope that the chain can continue to expand and do even more good work.

Wonderful place and great Location, I had a cold brew and a bagel with cream cheese. Lovely staff and manager was so helpful and super nice to her coworkers!
They have a huge map to mark where you are from with a Pin .
I will be coming back to try more coffee and the cupcakes !
Lovely coffee shop! Greeted warmly and served with a smile!

Mood booster - that is the way I would describe Bitty and Beau's. We were fortunate to visit when they were celebrating their one year anniversary, but I imagine anyone would have a five star experience here.

The coffee was top notch and they seemed to have a large menu of coffee and tea drinks both hot and cold. They also employ a large number of special needs staff that are a seamless part of the crew here. So cool.

We even walked out with a teddy bear and glass mug for free after spinning the wheel in celebration of their one year. Definitely stop by if you are in need of a coffee or a mood boost. This is one of the best coffee spots in Charlotte.
Great cup of coffee. Staff was friendly. A+ service.

My experience was super good, the people who serve you are super happy and very cooperative. Also buy some pods of a delicious coffee and the super place, you must put from which country you visit them.
Fantastic service! Love being able to work outdoors.
My morning coffee go to!! I love this place and their staff! Just a cool place with nice little vibe.
I love this place.  The coffee is great and the atmosphere is relaxing.  The vision and mission of Bitty and Beau's is so inspiring. Thank you.
Their mission and their coffee are as good as the service we received. Went here yesterday morning and my brown sugar latte was made to perfection
To slow!  Really slow

I love the idea behind Bitty & Beau's, and the atmosphere is great. But the iced coffee was horrible. I could tell as soon as they poured it that was incredibly watered down. Just completely tasteless. Ended up throwing it out and going elsewhere.

Great coffee and a great experience. I appreciate and support their employment practices. 5 stars all the way around. At the recommendation of the barista, I got a cold brew vanilla + oat milk coffee and it is the perfect afternoon pick-me-up.
Great people and great coffee.
This coffee is AMAZING and the inclusive environment is wonderful. They are truly radically inclusive! #NOTBROKEN

Coffee taste was subpar. I had a cold brew and was not impressed. Prices are high range. Shop is very clean and inviting. Staff are friendly. No cash accepted. Really? I attempted to tip in cash and cash is not accepted for tipping either. The idea behind their business model is motivating, but their product needs improvement.
Had a great cappuccino here. Although unexpectedly they have the best muffins I've ever had in my life. It was sort of like eating cake.
The latte was not good but the cold brew was delicious
I love this place. It's quiet, comforable,and the staff are fantastic!

I loved the simplicity of the menu. We were greeted as we entered. The employees were friendly and smiling. I was excited to finally visit a Bitty & Beau's after finding out about them online a couple of years ago. I am sad that there isn't one near me since we are visiting from out of town. Looking forward to future visits in my summer traveling for family vacation from Cincinnati to Seaside.

I've been to this location twice so far. Location and atmosphere are great. Plenty of space to work or hung out and drink coffee. Both times I got an iced chai and they were delicious. The employees are always cheery, upbeat and eager to ask about your day or tell you their recommendations. I have to say that when I went in today, I had been having a horrible day and they immediately put a smile on my face.
The place was really great.  Coffee was mediocre
AMAZING chai latte

Absolutely loved this place! The coffee is great and the people are too. Plenty of seating and a very nice ambience. They also have dairy alternatives and a variety of sugar-free syrup options. Definitely check this place out when you get a chance!

This place gets high reviews for hiring disabled people, which is awesome for them to do, but the coffee was among the worst coffee I've ever had. I travel A LOT and I am always interested in trying new spots within the cities I see. I don't expect everywhere to have the worlds best coffee (which I'm lucky to say I've had it in St. Louis) but the coffee here was as bad as nespresso. Taste, flavor, presentation, body, aroma, temperature, was all out of whack. Just bad coffee.
Really cool place!  Nice ice coffee, nice people, mostly college students.

I love the fact that this place hires individuals with special needs. The atmosphere is also awesome and a great place to sit and talk. However, I was quite disappointed with the iced Cafe Americano. It was subpar and lacked flavor and the proper amount of cream, sweetness, etc. If I were to go back, it would be to support the great cause of this coffee shop.
Great little shop. Good service, good product right in South End. We are here at least once a week and I am working from the shop as I type this review!
Been here a few times, always great service and coffee.
Delicious drinks and friendly staff with lots of parking closeby. Thanks for being a wonderful part of our community!

Great customer service, we were helped by Edward.
Thank you for helping us!!!
Awesome mission and awesome coffee. Everyone is so friendly. It's such a great atmosphere! So happy this is in Charlotte.
Excellent coffee. Wonderful atmosphere. And I'm delighted to support this community. Win-win-win!

I am a very Strong Coffee Drinker and after stopping in this location to get a cup to see what the BUZZ was about, I immediately fell in love with the Company!  Met the owners, And the manager ( Rachel ) plus Mathew.  Just a fantastic experience.   I highly encourage anyone to go.   Love it.  Walter.
Cooling air conditioner, cute comfy seating, nice atmosphere
I just got a regular coffee, very good coffee. Great place with a great mission.

Great concept great dining great company great place to meet new friends and dogs galore
Brilliant...
Great staff and excellent espresso.  This will definitely be a stop whenever in Charlotte.
Quick and friendly service. Will be back for the rainbow bagels.

What a little gem in Charlotte! I'm from out of town and just needed a spot to work remotely for the morning and was so lucky to come across this spot. Street parking is easy and free for 2 hours, which is a BIG plus. I'm pretty picky with coffee, and I ordered a cold brew with oat milk and it was delicious. The interior of the coffee shop is decorated very modern and cozy. While business is busy, the environment is still pretty conducive to productivity and it's not too loud. Also, can't forget, the employees are so kind! Highly recommend.

Clean place but don't look for a good flavor of bean. I asked for a cortado and they didn't know what it was which is usually not a good sign. The guy seemed annoyed that I was asking for something he didn't know perhaps he was challenged.

Such a wonderful place to grab a cup of coffee! It was my first time today, and the customer service was **chef's kiss** and I was so happy to see a place where everyone is welcome. The vibes are immaculate, and I am so happy that I chose to Bitty and Beau's this morning!
Cute spot, decent lattes and wonderful service! Love that they're all about inclusivity! Plenary of seating (inside and outside
Great concept and staff is very efficient. Come here instead of your daily Starbucks (it's even cheaper too)
Nice coffee shop. Really bright and clean.. My wife loved their Chia Latte and peanut butter cookie.

The latte was small, lukewarm, mostly milk foam and just very average.  I definitely prefer Central Coffee just down the street.

UPDATED FOR OWNER RESPONSE.  I did order the 16oz, it was half foam.  And I did order it extra hot.  You just made it luke warm.
Best location and patio for coffee in Charlotte. Coffee was great and cinnamon roll tasty. Perfect place to people watch in the heart of Southend.
Love the culture and concept! Coffee wasn't the best but okay.
Love this company! Love the space! & more importantly, LOVE our cappuccinos! They were A+! Their merch is also super DOPE! Will be returning ASAP!
Wonderful experience! The service and ambiance were both fantastic.
Friendly and helpful staff. The coffee was amazing!  I can't wait to make this place my daily coffee run!
Great coffee house with a cause. Great service but expect a wait because they are always busy

Best customer service ever!! Kind and attentive to customer needs. Love that they give those with Intellectual Disabilities a chance to shine and be a part of their community.
The only down side is, that's difficult to park in the area of the Coffee
Shop due to construction and very limited parking. Still give them 5 stars!!
Great atmosphere and friendly service and staff! Zach and Zoe were excellent and super helpful. 5/5, would totally come back again
Such a cute spot & great mission! Highly recommend the chai latte!
Great coffee with friendly people and a beau-tiful mission. Thank you!
Yessssss cool ppl goooooood coffeeeeeee

I love the idea behind this place. Offering an inclusive place where anyone can work with dignity and provide a useful service. It's also a great location, and very well set up inside and out

I ordered a latte, and after ordering they give you a playing card to pick up your order down the counter. There was a little mix up between my order and the one following it with the cards, but we got everything straightened out and my coffee was delivered and I was on my way. The coffee itself was fine, not the best latte ever, but far from the worst. They also have pastries and a ton of merch for sale inside. If you're on south end and feeling like a coffee, definitely come here over Starbucks.

Super cool set up and love how they chose to decorate the place. The customer service was perfect, super friendly. Even had someone at the door to greet everyone and hold the door for us. The coffee was really yummy, they have good flavor options and milk options. I will definitely be back and continue supporting!
The service was awesome!
Pleasant personnel.Nice surroundings. Limited food options .Only about 5 or 6 bakery choices.
I'm amazed by the atmosphere and that they let people who are a little different that we are work and they create an amazing vibe. Love it. And capuchino is amazing !
A new Charlotte Treasure.

What a fantastic place to grab delicious coffee, buy some gifts, and enjoy a fabulous space! I got a dirty chai latte with added pumpkin spice flavoring (thanks to an astute recommendation by the barista). Of course it goes without saying we should be thankful to have such a noble establishment leading the way in the community to model how businesses should offer inclusive employment opportunities for those with disabilities.
My favorite place to get coffee. The crew is friendly and helpful, the atmosphere is upbeat and fun...and the drinks are heavenly.
I enjoy the atmosphere and the people. I will go back soon. Good coffee and desserts, awesome staff.

Incredible! The coffee was fantastic with a wide variety of beverages and flavors from which to choose, both hot and cold. They also offer pastries along with some bagels with several options for spreads. On top of all of that, the service is top notch, with all staff being extremely friendly and helpful. We love the mission of this place, and will certainly be back again for the coffee and service!

Bitty and Beau's is a great place to  grab a coffee with friends or work on my laptop for the afternoon. The coffee is really good and the pastries are tasty too. This is such a convenient place in South End in Charlotte and the service is great! And I love it even more because it is giving people with intellectual and developmental disabilities a place of employment and that is so necessary for so many, and they are so capable. Can't wait till I go back!!
From the moment you walk in you are overwhelmed with the care and love that fills the place. Everyone is kind and attentive, and the coffee is delicious! Don't miss it!
Amazing spot! Will definitely be back!
Wonderful customer service. Such a friendly place. Loved my pumpkin spice latte!

Highly recommended. The staff is really nice. The wi-fi is really fast. The coffee is really good.
Also next to the center of South End, so after getting the morning joe and working through that inbox, there is many places in walking distance for lunch.
Good coffee
Love the staff, atmosphere, and blueberry muffins! The service is great and everyone is very friendly!! Definitely recommend!! :)))

Located in South End, Bitty and Beau's is a coffee shop that employs people with special needs. They also offer some pastries and merch. It's such a wonderful environment to be in; you can't help but smile. Five star chai with five star service.
Got to experience the energy and enthusiasm of the Bitty & Beau's employees at the Grand Opening! Great location and highly recommended!
This place is a wonderful experience. It supports an amazing cause for amazing individuals. I love this place and you will too!
Absolutely LOVED it! Will definitely be back soon!! You guys are AMAZING!!!
This place is pure joy!  Your heart will grow!
Amazing service and delicious coffee! Definitely have found the best new coffeeshop in South End!

We came to the grand opening. What an amazing inclusive place. My basket is very full knowing there are places like this here in Charlotte.

My wife's ice coffee and my smoothie were excellent.
Absolutely love this place
I loved my experience here! Very friendly staff, great customer service and the coffee was amazing!
